fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.design

Interface IListContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPageContext

    public interface IListContext
extends IPageContext
    Provides access to page processing context for list pages, including proxied access to relevant page processor methods.

    This interface is normally only required by implementations of IListPage.

    Thread safety: implementations are required to be safe for concurrent read/write access.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    REFLEXE Technologies
    See Also:
    IListPage.setPageContext(IListContext)

    • Method Detail

      • beforeDataFilter

        IFilter beforeDataFilter(IFilter filter)
                  throws ListFetchException
        Optionally replaces or modifies a search filter to be applied before fetching a list.

        When this is not required, this method should return null.

        Parameters:
        filter - search filter that will be applied before fetching a list, unless modified by this method. May be null, in which case this callback is an opportunity to provide a default filter. May be subsequently modified by an instance of IListFetchFilter.
        Returns:
        the modified (or unchanged) search filter, or an alternative search filter, or null if no changes are required.
        Throws:
        ListFetchException - if a processing error occurs.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        IFilter.and(IFilter), IListFetchFilter.beforeDataListFetch(fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.views.IListView)

      • beforeDataStore

        List<IItem> beforeDataStore(List<IItem> items)
                     throws ItemStoreException
        Optionally replaces or modifies items or attributes about to stored.

        When this is not required, this method should return null.

        Parameters:
        items - items that will be stored, unless modified by this method.
        Returns:
        the modified (or unchanged) list of items to store, or an alternative list of items to store, or null if no changes are required.
        Throws:
        ItemStoreException - if a processing error occurs.
        Since:
        1.0

      • afterDataListFetch

        IList afterDataListFetch(IList list)
                  throws ListFetchException
        Optionally replaces or modifies a fetched data list.

        When this is not required, this method should return null.

        Parameters:
        list - the list that was fetched.
        Returns:
        the modified (or unchanged) list of fetched items, or an alternative list of items, or null if no changes are required.
        Throws:
        ListFetchException - if a processing error occurs.
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        IListFetchFilter.beforeDataListFetch(fr.reflexe.viewshell.api.data.views.IListView)
